title: Introducing: Dear Anonymous
content:
Dear Anonymous have left me torn in a despicably self-centered manner.

Whilst wanting to promote new music, I also occasionally feel a sense of inner selfishness, maintaining my intimate connection with the music by keeping it entirely to myself. Anyway, having conquered my pretentious demons, I decided that Brisbane’s Dear Anonymous is just too good to not be heard. Drifting from melancholic piano ballads (Only Ones) to Antlers-esque lullaby’s (Awkward), the three piece comprised of Julia Kourtidis (piano/vocals), Rob Knaggs (cello) and Ben Tilney (guitar) are a further jewel in the constantly expanding crown that is Australia’s music scene. Check out their debut EP Songs For Chuck And Blair below.
